title: zlib.dll missing from computer?
body: How do I fix this error whenever i try to open the league client?

replies.body: I was able to log on by going into the admin launcher. Not sure if this is the correct solution, but it works.

It could work as a temporary workaround, but you could run into problems later on or even crash in-game if League doesn't have the right permissions to access game files.  You should still go over each step in that guide to make sure everything is in good shape to play!

The file might not actually be missing, but a security setting could be blocking it from being accessed.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure the patch can read your game files and get up to date.  I hope that helps!
